name: window-control-icons
description: Icons for window control buttons (close, minimize, maximize)

files.name: icons/index.tsx
files.content:
export { CloseIcon } from './close-icon'
export { ExpandIcon } from './expand-icon'
export { RemoveIcon } from './remove-icon'

files.name: icons/close-icon.tsx
files.content:
import React from 'react'

export function CloseIcon({ className }: { className?: string }) {
  return (
    <svg
      width="100%"
      height="100%"
      viewBox="0 0 12 12"
      fill="none"
      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
      className={className}
      preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid meet"
    >
      <path
        d="M2.375 2.375L9.625 9.625M9.625 2.375L2.375 9.625"
        stroke="currentColor"
        strokeWidth="1.5"
        strokeLinecap="round"
      />
    </svg>
  )
}

files.name: icons/expand-icon.tsx
files.content:
import React from 'react'

export function ExpandIcon({ className }: { className?: string }) {
  return (
    <svg
      width="100%"
      height="100%"
      viewBox="0 0 12 12"
      fill="none"
      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
      className={className}
      preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid meet"
    >
      <path
        d="M2.875 6.375V9.125H5.625M6.375 2.875H9.125V5.625"
        stroke="currentColor"
        strokeOpacity="0.5"
        strokeWidth="1.5"
        strokeLinecap="round"
        strokeLinejoin="round"
      />
    </svg>
  )
}

files.name: icons/remove-icon.tsx
files.content:
import React from 'react'

export function RemoveIcon({ className }: { className?: string }) {
  return (
    <svg
      width="100%"
      height="100%"
      viewBox="0 0 12 12"
      fill="none"
      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
      className={className}
      preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid meet"
    >
      <g clipPath="url(#clip0_69_71)">
        <path
          d="M8.12132 6.00023H3.87868M10.625 6C10.625 8.55432 8.55432 10.625 6 10.625C3.44568 10.625 1.375 8.55432 1.375 6C1.375 3.44568 3.44568 1.375 6 1.375C8.55432 1.375 10.625 3.44568 10.625 6Z"
          stroke="currentColor"
          strokeOpacity="0.5"
          strokeWidth="1.5"
          strokeLinecap="round"
          strokeLinejoin="round"
        />
      </g>
      <defs>
        <clipPath id="clip0_69_71">
          <rect width="12" height="12" fill="white" />
        </clipPath>
      </defs>
    </svg>
  )
}
